waiuru-ideal-platform: Waiuru is the ideal platform for
demo-request-text:
If you don't know us yet, request
 a free demo and see
how to have
subtitle-login: Fill in the data below to access your account.
subtitle-login-forgot-password:
Enter your email, we will send a password
 reset link to you.
subtitle-login-new-password:
Enter a secure password with
 at least 10 characters.
password-min: The password must be at least 6 characters long.
api-error-login: An error occurred. Please try again.
email_send: Link sent successfully to your email.
registration-subtitle: Register new visitors, orders, vehicles, residents, animals, employees, and more to keep your database up to date and ensure free access to the condominium.
settings-subtitle: Here you can change access permissions to the administrative panel, enabling or blocking access to the pages below, according to the departments of your condominium's employees.
dashboard-settings: Page with general condominium data, such as the number of visitors, residents, expense board, etc.
chat-settings: Message portal for contacting residents, employees, and partners.
access-control-registration-settings: Page with data for access control to the condominium. Example: visitors and vehicles that accessed the condominium today.
visitor-registration-settings: Page with a form for registering new visitors.
parcel-registration-settings: Page with a form for registering new parcels/packages.
residents-registration-settings: Page with a form for registering new residents.
animal-registration-settings: Page with a form for registering new animals.
online-voting-registration-settings: Page with a form for registering new online votes.
employee-registration-settings: Page with a form for registering new employees.
employees-settings: Page with data for managing all registered employees.
orders-settings: Page with data for managing all registered parcels/packages.
book-of-occurrences-settings: Page with data for managing all registered occurrences/incidents
lost-and-Found-settings: Page with data for managing registered items as found and lost.
financial-settings: Page with financial control data, such as cash inflow and outflow.
documents-settings: Page with all condominium documents. Example: Terms of Use, Internal Regulations, etc.
list-of-residents-settings: Page for control of all registered residents and their respective data.
online-voting-settings: Page with data of online condominium votes, such as initiated, closed, etc.
feed-settings: Page with posts promoted by the condominium.
advertisements-settings: Page for control of promoted advertisements and their advertisers.
service-provider-settings: Page with data of service providers for the condominium.
error-creating-employee: An error occurred while creating the employee. Please try again.
error-creating-order: An error occurred while creating the order. Please try again.
send-and-receive-messages-from-employees: Send and receive messages from employees, condominium owners, and more. Easy access, easy management.
